FuncDef:
The clock wtr command configures a WTR time for a status change after a clock source is restored.
By default, the WTR time of the status change after a changed clock source recovers is 5 minutes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the WTR time for a status change after a clock source is restored.
The value ranges from 0 to 12, in minutes. The default WTR time is 5 minutes. The step is 1 minute.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the device detects that the clock source is restored from abnormal to normal, it updates the status information in the display clock source command output only after a configured WTR time. You can configure an appropriate WTR time to reduce the effect of frequent clock source status changes on clock source selection.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
